name: Reality Roots
description:
Play in Fullscreen

A farming game about multiple realities made in 48 hours.

How to play

WASD/arrow keys to moveE to interact
LMB to plant seeds/harvest crops and buy/sell from the Scientist.

See how many Seeds|Crops you have on the top left of the screen.

Programming, Design, Art by Dimitris Ladias.

Audio by John Kyritsis.
John's Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/john-76231271

Special thanks to Discord user: "Clink#9168"
